channel.title: Screencasts on iplusfour
channel.description: Recent content in Screencasts on iplusfour

item.title: COWS! #TidyTuesday
item.description: In this week’s #TidyTuesday screencast I explore some cow facts, using the emojifont package for custom symbols as plot points.

item.title: Quick guide to setting up OBS studio
item.description: I got a little bit of interest in yesterday’s screencast for #TidyTuesday, so today I thought I’d give a simple guide to recording those screencasts with OBS studio. The text instructions are below and here’s a short video if you’re a visual learner. Download and install the software In the lower left of the window under scenes, click + and create a new scene called screencasts Under sources, click + and add a Display Capture.

item.title: My first TidyTuesday & screencast!
item.description: Like they say, long journeys start with a single step. This is my first time looking at a #TidyTuesday dataset and my first time doing an R screencast. This week’s data is on incarceration in the US, and in just a short exploration I find some interesting features.
